Reviews.Title: fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Ross N
Reviews.Content: i couldn't be happier with this product! it's incredibly durable and waterproof. i've used it rock climbing, swimming, jumping off a 20' cliff, and water skiing. be sure to youtube it - there are a lot of awesome videos taken with this camera. i got mine in the spring and can't wait to take it downhill skiing this winter

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Joe "Ninjapocalypse"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it's really not hard to work with at all once you know it, though as i remember the instructions said something incorrectly, it doesn't take much to figure it out. My camera has no rattle at all to it, and needed no tape whatsoever as others have said. high quality recordings and photos. even with the waterproof case on i still get sound recording of people near the camera. glad to see an affordable waterproof photography option, though you will be stuck with the wide angle lens. very wide. for true artists you will have to get used to getting the shot you want out of this fish eye, as you also have no viewfinder. it's an action cam but i can make plenty of uses for it. always wanted a waterproof setup at an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Go Pro kicks A$$
Reviews.Author: heloflyer
Reviews.Content: The go pro is simply awesome.  I suction it to my motorcycle tank and start the filming.  It takes clear video and hangs on nicely over bumps no matter the speed.

Reviews.Title: HD Motorsports HERO
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: Great little high-def camera, plenty of mounting options. Records great on land and underwater. Takes nice still images as well. Many recording resolutions. All around great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Chill 1
Reviews.Content: I bought this from amazon, not a seller on amazon, and it came super fast. It was also way cheaper then what the go pro website sells there's for so I saved a lot of money. Don't believe any of the 1, 2, star ratings, go pro makes excellent quality cameras. Just beware who you buy it from.

Reviews.Title: GoPro HD Motorsports HERO
Reviews.Author: SGG
Reviews.Content: GoPro HD Motorsports HERO is easy to use, great quality, worth all the money... packs more power than most professional cameras on the market today...Developed for professional use, but at a consumer price...

Reviews.Title: gopro
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: Great product thought it would come with the helmet attachment but works well was easy to figure out.Like the clearness of the pic even under harsh conditions. Wide angle lens is great. Sound is hard to hear have to turn up the sound on my computer to max.

Reviews.Title: GoPro vs ATC9K
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I purchased the GoPro after a regrettable loss of my ATC9K.  I did this so I could evaluate another action camera.  So far I have Kayaked with it and tried multiple mounting locations on my car and motorcycle.  I would halfto say that the mounting of the Gopro is sufficient but not optimal.  The ATC9K was not perfect either but did offer easier adjustment without needing to alter setting for upside down mounting.The Video quality is nearly identical, recordings from my ATC9K in full 1080P and the new Gopro 1080P can hardly be differentiated.  That being said, I have noticed some frame glitch on the GoPro.  This is noticeable when street signs or light posts are passing bye in the field of view as they are smooth for several seconds then jump to nearly off screen.  I repeated this observation with several different SD cards all the way up to my Class 10 20mb/s card used in my professional digital still camera and still had a frame glitch as I had suspected it was a buffer to card data flow issue... nope.  I have been altering the setting from r1 to r5 and regardless of the setting, there is a frame glitch every couple of seconds.  Granted it could be my camera is defective but the issue is not significant enough for me to want to go through the long process of replacing it.  So if anyone else has this issue please let me know, or if not I might be motivated to replace it.Battery life:  As the documents say it will record for over two hours, and it does.  I have made fully charged to dead battery recordings several times to validate this and each one has been from 2.1 to 2.5 hrs.  The ATC9K without the GPS unit installed would also makes these times also, with GPS unit, about ¾ the time due to greater load.  The GPS unit was a nice addition though. HINT to GoPro!!!! How about a GPS Backpack attachment?The Standard SD card slot is nice and makes for easy manipulation of video, not to mention the price decrease for some really nice 32 gb class 10 cards out there for less than $100. The ATC9K uses the micro SD cards which are kind of a pain in the @#$...Hope this was helpful, any question feel free to contact me

Reviews.Title: Great camera for action photography
Reviews.Author: richard travis gibbs
Reviews.Content: This little video camera packs alot of versatility in a small package.  If you want to mount it somewhere there is most likely a mount available that will fit your specific application.  To date I have mostly used this on mountain bike rides, and once you get the mounts tight enough it will hold solid.  Im very pleased with the picture quality.  I tend to leave mine set on 720p at 60fps.  The menus are a bit difficult to navigate, however its an action camera and I think intended to remain on one setting during your activity.  Honestly I would have to have the instructions with me if I wanted to change the settings.  In addition, the sound quality is pretty rough if you have the waterproof housing on.  I also noticed when I had it attached to my mountain bike, it picked up alot of bike noise, I would assume through the frame. One of my brakes was clicking cause the brake disc was bent and thats about all you could hear in the video is the clicking noise the whole time.  Also, a word of caution, while this camera is waterproof, it does not float.  I lost my first in the bottom of Buffalo Bayou on a kayaking trip, along with a suction cup mount, the day after I bought it.  So if you plan on using it on a kayak I would recommend either a surfboard mount, or some sort of leash system.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jaime Cordoba
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, It has great resolution and it is so versatile you can use it almost everywhere.I also bought the bike mount and the chest strap so my kids and I can film from different views.It would be great if there would be a steadicam for this camera, that would make it impressing.

Reviews.Title: 2 of 4 worked
Reviews.Author: MarvelousProduction "marvinfc"
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a gopro because it was cheap on overstock. which worked great and did what it supposed to do but then I decided I wanted to go 3D.  That's when I ran into 2 bad gopro units from Sport Chalet.  The first one I got from Sport Chalet worked okay for about a month then it stopped holding the memory card, the spring loaded mechanism wouldn't click when card was in.  So I got it exchanged, then the 2nd one program was all messed up, it wouldn't let me go into settings and weird things showed up on screen.  I managed to make it finally update the firmware after multiple tries, but that didn't help either.  So I had to bring back to sport chalet once again.  So I've filmed a couple times with the 3rd replacement from sport chalet and see what happens but so far so good but its only been 6 days and 1 day of real use.Overall, when the product works its pretty good.  Indoor filming is pretty poor, its really a daytime use camera only.  I really like the superwide angle lens, takes a little getting used to.  The menus take some getting used to and I still have to reference the manual on what things mean after 4 months.  The 3d synching and software works pretty well. Some of my vegas videos maybe found on youtube ([...]).The price point for underwater 3d camera, you can't beat and has ease of software once filmed is unbeatable.  No regrets on the purchase but you just get what you pay for.  For overall video quality I will still rank it below my 3ccd HD camcorder, dslr, and droid x video camera.

Reviews.Title: Best Price on Internet- Unbelievable product
Reviews.Author: N. Chappell
Reviews.Content: After months of research, we bought a GoPro.  We are now thinking of buying a second.  This little camera is great.  No bells and whistles, just what you need.  We use it mountain biking and it takes great pics and video.  I would recommend buying the LCD screen so you can see exactly where you are placing the lens.  Otherwise, you may get the shot too high or get part of your helmet in the video :-)

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Nic "WildStill"
Reviews.Content: So affordable you almost want to go out and see if you can destroy it during filming. Go get crazy with this camera. The stills function is great because underwater housing for DSLRs and any other digital camera is super expensive this is such a cheap way to film and take stills underwater.

Reviews.Title: Go Pro HD Helmet Cam
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Mccarty
Reviews.Content: Great camera and very sharp video. Must get the BacPac viewer for easy use. I used this on my motorcycle and strapped it on the front fender. Very good view and sharp.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Motorsport
Reviews.Author: Robert Schoppman
Reviews.Content: Very fun to use.  The only thing I thought was lacking is more instructions.  Just go to YouTube and watch some videos on mounting. Great little video camera.

Reviews.Title: fabulous camera.
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Daniel
Reviews.Content: the quality of the images and video is fabulous.  the product and the case and mounting accessories are superior quality.  the variety of setting for shooting is more than adequate for documenting action/travel.  highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera.. but mine was lil messed up.
Reviews.Author: Davy
Reviews.Content: The camera works amazing! Such great quality pics and vids, but mine had a freezing problem that I talked to GoPro about and they let me send it back to them and they sent me a new one that works great.

Reviews.Title: GoPro great, editing footage not so much...
Reviews.Author: novice video editor
Reviews.Content: The only reason I didn't give it a full five star rating is because of the difficulty I had in finding a method to edit gopro footage. The only products that really work are ones that cost money. I did eventually get Windows Live Moviemaker to work, but it isn't very good and it took way too much effort to get it to handle the video files. During my research I found that there are waaaay too many people having the same problems I am. It would be great if GoPro would offer a video editor with their product so that nobody would have to go through the same painful process I did, and so that we don't all have to shell out for something like Adobe Premiere or Final Cut.As far as usability, quality, durability (all the "ity's" really...), I have only complements to offer GoPro.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous product!
Reviews.Author: Carrie B. Partridge "Carrie Bevell Partridge"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband, who is a videographer, and he has had a blast with it! Filming things under water has been lots of fun. The quality is great!

Reviews.Title: Go Pro
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Moore "Abilenemike"
Reviews.Content: Rugged little camera. Kind of hard to get use to the mounts could be a little more verisal. Over all a good camera so far

Reviews.Title: I Love My GoPro!
Reviews.Author: David Campbell
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great! I've seen a few bad reviews, but look seriously at what you are buying.The menus are hard to navigate with the little screen. It's made to be small. If you get the optional lcd screen it's easy to setup. I gave it 5 stars in everything but ease of use, but I must be honest anything like this is going to require a little creativity and mechanical inclination. It wouldn't be as much fun otherwise. Search Vimeo and youtube, check out gopro's facebook page.Quality on video is astounding in good light. It's not a low-light camera, but it cost $300(or less). Stills are good quality also, keep in mind this thing is a fisheye so it's made for close and POV filming, if you do any kind of sport you really want one, trust me. I use mine for skateboarding, road, mountain and BMX cycling, swimming, dog cam, various fun photos on outings, etc. I've more than gotten my money's worth and I've only had it for 3 months, still figuring out new ways to be creative with it.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice for Many - but ...
Reviews.Author: Rich "Desert Dweller"
Reviews.Content: First let me say that this product is definitely a step in the right direction with a fairly high quality picture and several mounting setups. For most people this is a good choice.Still, I returned mine to the manufacturer. I bought directly on their web site which has a 30 day return policy.The videos on their web site are works of art - but you will notice that many are done in midair or on smooth surfaces so there is minimal vibration. In a skateboard video on their web site there is actually no footage from the Hero on his chest mount while he is rolling!  it was filmed by the observer!For my application I was recording going down a choppy mountain trail. In the test video link below you can see the affect.[...]It is not bad - but I preferred video from an old Canon G9 strapped to my chest even though its resolution and frame rate were much less.In the video you can see that the video has a yellow hue until after 20 seconds at which time it goes away. And the view is almost fisheye making my arms bowed.Setup is easy only if you have the instructions in front of you since there are just a couple of buttons and a small menu square on the front. That is OK if you plan to setup once and not make field changes. Results can not be seen until you get home.With my unit I could not get the SD card out. Once in if you press again it should pop right out. Not so with mine.I tried the same mountain bike run with a Nikon S9100 strapped to my chest. The results were not as good as with the Hero. The problem with modern cameras is the Progressive Shutter that gives jerky video a jello affect. So my quest will continue - perhaps foam padding on the chest mount. Perhaps finding a camera with a Global Shutter instead of Progressive.So view some of the YouTube videos by real users doing the things you want to record. If you like, you will probably like this solution.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for paintball
Reviews.Author: Mnl4jc
Reviews.Content: Writing this review base on one time use during a paintball session.CONS:Fish eye recording... Meh, wish it had a normal recording settingDoes not do great in the dark. Video quality suck in low light placesSound is horrible when cover with full casing (not water proof).Overall, I was able to mount this camera on my forehead using the Head-Strap Mount on my VForce grill mask. I was also able to mount it on my Phenom X7 using the strap-mount for vented helmets on the front side. Quality was amazing on my Vizio 37" TV and accentuates colors. The casing is able to protect the camera from paintball hits and splatter which was a decision beaker for me. Keep in mind that your class of your SD card and you TV/monitor contributes to the recording quality and playback.The reason I gave it a 4 star was because of the cons and price :)Check out video for video quality

Reviews.Title: A nice addition to your gadget bag
Reviews.Author: jim patrick "jim patrick"
Reviews.Content: Whether you're using this in your project or just for fun, this little gadget is a must if you're into videography. If you like filming sports, it's a given (this is the biggest thing about this camera) - but this can do more than recording "sport" events. You can use this in filming "time-lapse", recording a bad weather, a "MTV shots", a long road trip-which i use these footage as a background in my Chroma Key Screen, and many other uses beyond a regular camera filming can do.Also, one of the features that i really like is that it can take still pictures at a certain rate of time that you can set. Quality of the pictures/movie taken? It's a movie quality @ 1080P.Why 4 stars -although it took me a long time to get this from AMAZON - 3x they postponed the shipment - but this is not the reason why - for you to be able to record everything unimaginable that you can think of, you need to spend a couple of hundreds of $$ more on accesories...all in all, you will spend around $500 for the entire set - & if you need to film in 3D, you need to spend $300 more...that's when it loses a star.

Reviews.Title: Good value, great videos
Reviews.Author: LenN
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband before he went on a trip to Africa.  He found it easy enough to use, although the housing is a bit of a bother and it's too bad it doesn't have an LCD screen.  It did hold up well under some difficult conditions and the video is excellent quality.  We researched a good bit before we bought it and are satisfied with it so far.  Have owned it for about 3 months.

Reviews.Title: Great POV Camera
Reviews.Author: Yokota
Reviews.Content: Great POV camera for under 300 dollars, pictures a nice a crisp and videos are amazing. Great for action shots! The menu can be a little troublesome the first few times you use it but once you get the hang of it it's amazing what you can do. I highly recommend getting some video editing software when you buy this though, you can download free trial from the manufactures website to test drive a few before you spend 80+ on one though!

Reviews.Title: Cool camera
Reviews.Author: J. Ostafew
Reviews.Content: Haven't had a chance to shoot too much video with it but what I have done has pretty much been what I expected. The motorsport kit comes with the great suction cup mount and tons of additional fittings to mount to stuff. A bit of reviewing will tell you this camera isn't great in low light and the sound quality is kinda poor (non-existant with the closed rear panel), but in a well lit area you will get great video. The wide angle is really good too, you'll get a great view of the action. This baby will get well used at my AutoX events on the car, strapped to the Mtn bike, taking it sky-diving, strapped to a model helicopter etc. etc. etc.!

Reviews.Title: Everything I Had Hoped For
Reviews.Author: Matt P
Reviews.Content: Have been wanting a GoPro for a while after using with a friend riding last winter.  I will say, GET THE LCD PACK. It is so worth it I can't even explain, even if just for accessing the menu (I love being able to set up on my bike and get an idea of what it will look like long before I make it back to my computer to upload).Regardless, you can't get a more durable HD camera out there - anywhere you can't bring your clumsy video camera you over paid for, you can take a GoPro instead, underwater, mud biking in the rain, on top of your car in a snowstorm, in a beer at a party, etc etc you get the idea of the endless possibilities.If your not an active person, don't bother and just get an overly priced video camera to record yourself doing nothing on the couch, otherwise get a GoPro and get outside to catch some sweet footage.

Reviews.Title: GoPro HD motosports hero camera
Reviews.Author: Yardslave
Reviews.Content: Great video quality, poor to okay sound, we have used the camera on a chest harness and helmet mount for skiing, snowboarding and dirtbiking.  I have also used the suction cup mount on my streetbike and it held with no problems at all on a fairly bumpy road.  One of my friends bought a different brand that is pretty close in price, has a more positive on and off switch, lasers that tell you where the camera is aimed (very handy) and can download gps info with speeds and altitudes.  However the GoPro is waterproof which was a definite positive for me as we plan on using it for snorkel, scuba, and wakeboarding.

Reviews.Title: Loving my GoPro Cam
Reviews.Author: dadellman
Reviews.Content: didn't know much about video camcorders, so it took me awhile to do my research.  i wanted to make sure i could get the most out of my investment.  since i love the outdoors (hiking and everything beach) this choice would be the best and it surely is!  the 2 things that sticks out for me is it's visual (pix & vid) quality and that it's hands free, works great for my type of activities outside.  at the time i purchased this cam (Jan. '11) the LCD backpack wasn't available, now that it is i love it even more. i would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves the outdoors and requires a hands free cam...your outdoor life will get easier...mine did.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Lpeden
Reviews.Content: just a great camera anybody can use it GREAT VIDEOS If you want to show your friends how you ride this is the camera for you Its also great for anything you do outside inside anywhere

Reviews.Title: Takes great videos and photos!
Reviews.Author: Smart shopper
Reviews.Content: Took this on a horse drive in Montana.  Mounted to a helmet.  Even though I am trotting and galloping, video is steady and doesn't really move.  Really sharp, clear picture.This is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: J. Cotter
Reviews.Content: I am using this in an airplane and the actual video quality is great.  The only two issues:  Since it is digital, it has a problem with the turning propeller. The other issue is the suction cup mount, that has to be mounted on a side window.  It would be nice for the mount to work on a surface that faces any direction.  Even with these two items, I really like this camera.

Reviews.Title: High quality video from a little package.
Reviews.Author: JD Rios
Reviews.Content: Though I have only had time to fill one 16GB card with video I have been impressed with the quality of this camera. It's very easy to learn to use and the controls are simple and straight forward.The only real negative is the mounts that clip into the stick on bases. There is play there and it rattles, thus showing up in the audio as a clicking noise. I've heard the exact same noise in a bunch of GoPro videos. Kinda annoying that they couldn't come up with a better mounting system but I will be fixing it on mine with a custom mount.Overall the video quality is very good and it's surprising that such a tiny unit can produce such high quality video. I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great hd camera
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: GREAT hd camera for the price, i take it everywhere. bought the go pro car package , quality is amazing for the price.

Reviews.Title: GoPro HD Hero
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I took it along with my slr on vacation to Hawaii and got  a ton of still shots and video of snorkeling and swimming into waterfalls. The focus is a bit soft under water, but it is not really what this camera was made for so I am not complaining. I would definately buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Amazing Pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Hausladen
Reviews.Content: If you want to get some good shots while out and about this is the camera for you. The mounts are easy, and with a little configuring time, you will take wonderful pictures. Above all, remember that when going over 100 m.p.h. to use the "waterproof" cover!  Enjoy this camera, and the movies that you can take while out and about.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Primelies
Reviews.Content: Almost didnt give this a good review because maybe then fewer people would be making kick a** videos but since so many folks already know about this camera theres no point!  Only used it a couple times on my motorcycle but the sound and video are both just mind blowing.  Everything about this camera rocks except the tiny LCD screen and the confusing menus.  If you dont carefully read the instructions its easy to get frustrated.  but once you get the menus figured out its not so bad.  The video is great and the sound system is fantastic.  Looking forward to a summer of diving, ziplines, bunjee, small planes rides, motorcycle rides, rafting and who knows what else!!!  and all of it on video!  :)

Reviews.Title: My super cool new toy! and latest firmware...
Reviews.Author: Dad Engineer "engineer"
Reviews.Content: Hey I dig this camera a lot.  This camera has the latest firmware by the way so you don't need to update.  I was shooting slow mo and time lapse right away.  I found the instructions clear and well laid out.  Using the camera is actually easy for me and I don't mind the tiny cryptic screen.  Heck I'm glad its not some cookie cutter automatic point and shoot Best Buy jobbie.Only dings - the sound is not what I got this for so I am ok with its lacking good sound while in its enclosure.  And I wish it had better image stabilization.  Otherwise the picture is warm and this camera has soul.It would be stellar if they could include a simple editing program for their MP4 format - and that could retain the 60fps.  Something just to take the ginormous video files and quickly splice out what you want or don't want.Also - I've made some DIY accessories like a boom and waterproof flat lense (failed oops) and a gimble steadycam using a Gyrobowl!

Reviews.Title: What a great way to relive an experience!
Reviews.Author: madpowseeker
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks. It could be alittle bit simpler to use. My biggest problem was turning the camera on when it was on my helmet and holding the power button to long. This changed the camera from the default video mode to the 3 pic burst mode. The beeps could be a bit louder... Another thing i would love to see is some kind of wireless remote you could mount on your arm or handlebar for shooting still pictures. I love the camera! Great product and if you are thinking about buying one, DO IT!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: GoPro has some of the best quality video cameras for action sports. The camera has excellent sound quality, which is just as important as picture quality when it comes to action sports.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Great !!!
Reviews.Author: EODAlaskan
Reviews.Content: Great camera,very easy to use and works like a champ for such a small camera ( looks like it came out of a gumball machine it's so small ),think I might buy another,maybe two so everyone has one and I won't have to share. Riding our snowmobiles neary 100 mph and the video showed no vibrations. Lots of fun.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Xerxia
Reviews.Content: great little camera, video great and audio not bad even with the waterproof case on.  mounts work good so far

Reviews.Title: Love story
Reviews.Author: Chips
Reviews.Content: Just the best camera I've ever had.Works perfectly and I hope we'll do a lot again together.

Reviews.Title: GoPro is Pro
Reviews.Author: Gregero
Reviews.Content: I've taken this camera with me to the desert, to the snow, on jarring trails, and on the highway in the rain. Not once has it failed me. It captures such stunning image quality and can do 60 frames per second, making everything seem so smooth. The housing is durable and is easily cleanable after a good mud splash- just use your thumb and some good ol spit grease. My friends love it; we use it for our Toyota trailing. I could just go on and on. Trust me- you don't wanna miss out on this camera. I haven't ran it in 1080P yet (using 960 for wide angle) but I'm more than sure it'll look amazing. Get this camera!

Reviews.Title: Go Pro HD
Reviews.Author: MexMX
Reviews.Content: This product is awesome, the image quality exceeded my expectations, it is a little heavy but nothing to worry about, because it is HD the image is a little more shaky than its predecessor, I would buy it again but i think it is really expensive compared the other cameras that have better features, it is practical and indestructible, this is the main reason i bought this although I Knew other cameras like the contour had Blutooth and GPS on them , GoPro needs to step it up and be more reasonable with price, they know they have an awesome product but need to step it up for the price and technology they offer.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: John Flora
Reviews.Content: Having used one of the standard-res GoPro cameras for a couple of years, I am absolutely blown away by the HD resolution and color rendition of this camera.The LCD menu is small and requires my reading glasses to operate. It takes some time to learn the menu, but once you figure out how to navigate it, operation becomes simple and straightforward.As with all menu-driven cameras, YOU HAVE TO READ THE MANUAL. Don't expect a good experience if you don't READ THE MANUAL.Image quality is a quantum jump from the old GoPro, the ability to use an SD card over 2GB is a huge improvement, and the rechargeable battery is a way better solution than the old single AAA battery for a power source.I have a mounting bracket attached to my motorcycle helmet and have used the suction cup mount enough to have 100% confidence in its ability to hold fast.I'm looking forward to making some memorable motorcycle videos this summer.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I bought this present for my bf's bday... He really loves it and has a lot of fun playing with it.  Alot of his friends were rather jealous and forced them to join the "cool club" and get one as well.  The videos are really good works awesome at night and just an overall awesome present!

Reviews.Title: GoPro is user friendly!
Reviews.Author: Chico wade
Reviews.Content: We used the GoPro hd video camera for bass fishing and snow mobiling. The different mounts are handy for sticking the camera anywhere you want. On your helmet, on top of the outboard motor on your boat etc, use your imagination. The wide angle video is crystal clear. And the sound is good too. I can't wait to take it scuba diving! It's supposed to be water proof down to 180 feet.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Camera
Reviews.Author: M. McCollum
Reviews.Content: The first time I came across a GoPro Camera was on a dive at 104ft of water.  It had been there for over five days and the camera turned on & was operable when it was brought to the surface.  That alone created criteria & reinforced my decision to go with GoPro, for a helmet camera: water proof, durable, photo/video, & easy to operate. Thus far (after a month) this camera appears to meet the criteria. For a two button Camera - it has options for format, picture, multiple picture intervolves, video, & image size.I was not sure if it came with a data storage card. It did not. I was unable to determine that from the advertisement (pictures / verses text). The other disappoint was with all the mounts, it did not include the handle bar/ seat post mount. I also prefer the tubular/ streamlined look of the other cameras verses the box form of this one.  Yet I went with the GoPro anyways. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: For intended use it's great
Reviews.Author: Bill Towery
Reviews.Content: Video quality is excellent.Audio is better than I expected but I didn't expect hifi.Setup is fairly straight forward but can be frustrating until you get the hang of it.Definitly get the firmware upgrade for more options and better features.I understand there is supposed to be a lcd monitor to be available sometime this year and that will be a must have for me. Even though wide angle of view makes exact aiming not all that important it will be nice to see what you are getting.Haven't played with the time lapse feature yet but that should be fun.Get an extra battery or two and an external charger if you plan on long shoots. Also the tripod mount is a handy accessory.

Reviews.Title: GoPro
Reviews.Author: Kimberley Deiner "KimD"
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my husband for Christmas....he loved it!!!  We ride snowmobiles and Harley's and he is looking forward to using it!

Reviews.Title: This camera is the business.
Reviews.Author: D. Overbeck
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever purchased. What it does it does incredibly well. I would have paid 5x the amount to get the same results, and because of that I will probably get 5 more. You really have to see this camera in action to believe it. The time lapses I get from vehicles, or stationary, are just incredible.Get the camera. You won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great HD Sports Cam
Reviews.Author: Ken Rogers
Reviews.Content: I bought the GoPro HD Motorsports Hero Camera for recording my RC plane and helicopter flights. It's a great camera that produces high quality HD video and when used with the slotted back on the case, also produces good audio. I had first bought a Contour HD helmet cam because I thought the form factor was a little more appealing, but I had to return it because it suffered from interference whenever I turned on my 2.4 GHz RC transmitter. This exhibited itself as a low frequency hum in the processed video. The GoPro doesn't have that problem and works very well for my intended use. I bought the GoPro head strap mount that places the camera on the front of your head and it works great even when wearing a baseball cap, as I do when flying.I use it in the 1080p 30 fps mode because I like the narrower angle for my use. The battery has long life and with a 15gb SD card the longest I have recorded is 1.5 hours continuous, and I could have gone much longer. It's output is in the form of .mp4 files which are accepted by most video editing programs directly. By using the solid back on the case, it can be used underwater but the audio will suffer. The Motorsports version comes with all kinds of pieces for mounting to helmets and other surfaces. Unfortunately, if you want the head strap mount as I did, you have to pay extra for it.Overall, a great sports camera for almost any use. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Review of Hero GoPro HD
Reviews.Author: CQ
Reviews.Content: This small camera is awesome and easy to use. The only drawback is the trial and error of pointing in the correct angle, either vertical or horizontal. In my case it is attached to a helicopter flight helmet for internal and external missions. It has proven itself as a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Marco Sampaio
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm. Video quality is excellent. Sound quality is OK, but the camera is in its waterproof case, so what would you expect?Comes with several different mounting brackets, allowing for multiple settings on the spot.

Reviews.Title: ACE cam
Reviews.Author: Maxfromsweden
Reviews.Content: does the job beautiful! using it for BASE-jumping, scubadiving and snowboarding.a little tricky in the beginning, a lot of settings. but very well usabel settings!! battery cam be a little tricky in very cold conditions

Reviews.Title: great adventure camera
Reviews.Author: Andy Norlander
Reviews.Content: This camera is small enough to tuck in the waistband of my swimsuit or wetsuit. I have recorded wonderful videos of interactions with dolphins and the occasional shark here in Kona waters! Great video in a wonderfully small and tough package! Easy to use too!

Reviews.Title: GoPro Hero HD Motorsports cam
Reviews.Author: MXROutlaw
Reviews.Content: Greatest Cam around.. love the great quality of video,audio,pic... good items in package.. love it

Reviews.Title: Great Racing Camera, and Amazingly Versatile
Reviews.Author: Rounds Racing "racingandengineer_guy"
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a 3-day stint at the track, and recorded 8+ sessions on my Formula Continental with the roll bar mount.  We even ran really hot on one of the runs (i.e. 230F+...) and the thing never flinched.  Great camera at an unbelievable price.  Here's some video I just uploaded (excuse the driving - it was only my 2nd weekend in my short racing career).  This is using the 960 line resolution mode, which gives a "taller" view, so you don't have to worry about the mounting angle.  This is at 30fps, but there is also a 60fps mode that is REALLY smooth.  A 16GB card has plenty of room for 3hrs+, so I simply turn it on when I belt in, and forget about it (camera can handle up to a 32gb card - I'm just too cheap).  Takes 2min to edit out the extra video when you get back, or simply click ahead when viewing.  It uses a mini-USB (same as my cell phone) for charging, and got fully charged between sessions in plenty of time.  For next time, I'm planning on using the 1.5" extention to get more of the cockpit (wheel, shifter, etc).Best part about it is that I took it off of the car, and am using it for filming pheasant hunting, snowboarding, waterskiing, etc.  For $250, it is a slam dunk for me.  I heard horror stories about previous versions not holding up.  Looks like they fixed more than a few of the bugs.  I am a very happy customer![...]

Reviews.Title: GoPro HD Camera Naked Motorsports Waterproof  Video Camera
Reviews.Author: IBoughtIt
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the video man looking for action shots. Many accessories are available for purchase that allows amazing shots. No viewfinder and getting to the right setting can be a pain but it's great for the price. Very wide angle, waterproof, and HD make it great. Not so great is the audio. Very small allows you to get great HD video in places a normal camera could never fit. I'm buying a second one...it's that great!

Reviews.Title: I love my new gopro
Reviews.Author: siestashawn
Reviews.Content: I started using my new cam as soon as I opened the box. I took a little while to read the cleas instructions and the menu options - it is all very logically thought out and everything worked just as it stated. <y first project turned out beautifully and I've done many more in the past 2 weeks since receiving my cam. I especially like the interval recording feature - stop motion animation. I've already uploaded 2 youtube videos in the entertainment category. You can find them on my youtube channel - siestashawn. One is "Siesta Key Chamber of Commerce Giclee Installation" and the other is "A Quick Trip to Crescent Beach on Siesta Key, FL." I love mine and I may buy several others to rent to friends that are envious.

Reviews.Title: I take this thing everywhere!
Reviews.Author: jeremyejackson
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this product?  It's incredible!  1080p at 30 and 720p at 60?  Plus timelapses you can set at 2, 5, 10, 30, and 60 second intervals?  This is a great camera to have in your bag.  Plus it goes underwater!  Possibilities are endless.  Underwater timelapse anyone?  Why yes please!The menu is a little tricky to navigate since all you have is a tiny lcd on the front, but once you learn what means what, it's pretty simple... just a lot of button clicking!I find myself buying more and more accessories for it to mount it to different things.  Like the chest strap and bike mount.Pure genius in a tiny little box!

Reviews.Title: Incredible piece of equipment!
Reviews.Author: Netburn
Reviews.Content: If you're into sports, extreme activities, flying, racing, running, or whatever involves action you must have this little camera. It's little and light but yet it records amazing quality video, with great sound. You can place it almost anywhere you want and it will for sure record thrilling videos.I use it in my flight trainning for recording my flying experience.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for motor sports
Reviews.Author: Ashley Hill
Reviews.Content: The HD quality is amazing.  The suction cup mount is ridiculously sturdy @ 100+Mph.  The sound quality is lacking.  I've been trying to think of a way to cover the optional open back with some sort of foam to prevent sound, but haven' had any luck.  Definitely a great camera if you're into tracking your car.  I edit my video's with music anyway, so it's not THAT important to me, but others might see where it would be important.  I'm going to have aftermarket exhaust eventually which should make the sound penetrate through the complete closed case better.[...]

Reviews.Content: Iv tried everything, Every kind of camera set up for my youtube videos. But then again who cares your not buying it for the audio your getting it for the picture. If you want to see it in action,  feel free to check out my youtube page. [...]

Reviews.Title: GoProHd Hero..Great little camera
Reviews.Author: John Fitzgerald "formula first racing"
Reviews.Content: The GoProHd Hero is a perfect camera for racing or just about any sport, the picture quality is great, the unit is small and the operation is quite simple. The case is rugged and waterproof and it has replacable lens protectors(optional). It comes with a variety of mounting options, however, i would like to see a ball head type mount for more versatility, it could easily be done using a rubber ball and metal clamp/set screw much like the omnimount speaker mounts. Other than that, this is a great little camera and i highly reccomend it to anyone who wants to video their racing/sports activities.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera.
Reviews.Author: ShaneW
Reviews.Content: This thing is sweet as.Got extremely cheap because I fancied trying it out, 40 dollars!Anyway to my points.Not impressed with low light capability, (I presume the low iso is the culprit) but what can I say for such a small camcorder. With good lighting it takes fantastic video. So far 0 problems. Nothing I can really complaim about it.I know it is a fairly old model noq but even then, takes breathtaking videos. Still trying to figure it out, but I can tell its gonna be worth it.If you fancy trying this little guy out for what it can do, go for it. Its an amazing little device.As far as problems with memory cards as other reviewers have done, there is no problem if you buy the RIGHT card for WHAT it ia used for. Taking high quality movies with a memory card rated at class 4 is stupid. Get a class 10 and it will run fantastically. Tbh these days anything lower than a class 10 is a pointless purchase. Class 10 or UHS-1 are the only class typea worth a dime. I personally only use class 10 or higher to ensure they will work with any device without a hitch. Ignore any reviewer that says memory cars issues, as they are using the incorrect card.Buy it, enjoy it. It is one of the coolest things on the market. I plan on purchasing a wifi bacpac and a spare battery personally. Probably a wrist, head, and car mount. Then some adhesive backs so I can attach it to random junk and places.

Reviews.Title: It's a view you would never get.
Reviews.Author: Lenny
Reviews.Content: This is a toy, maybe a bit narcisstic, but hey, it's fun.Most of us aren't professinal surfers, we don;t have people taking pics of our surfing from in the water (if we're lucky, we might have a few shots from the beach). This opens up a new view and gives a perspective of just how big / small the surf actually was.It's easy to use in the water.Note that the battery life is pretty short in cold water - you need to charge it each day you surf in cold water. The controls can be a little hard ot use in winter gloves in the water, but it still works.I'm glad I bought it, and will update to the next generation when this one eventually fails.... approx 2 years now, and all good. :-)

Reviews.Title: how can I fail you today?
Reviews.Author: Felix Margadant
Reviews.Content: The camera is very well built, packaged, and of excellent finish. All accessories are of quality materials and fit perfectly.If the user interface and especially the reliability of the recording was 10% of the mechanical beauty of this camera, it would be a solid 5 star rating.Much like I others, I find the neolithic user interface very cumbersome. a 3 digit display guides you through all the settings of metering, frame rate, resolution, and recording settings. 3 digits of weirdly chosen acronyms.But that is not my main grievance as I could probably live with a single setting and consulting the manual now and then. My main complaint is that every ride, the camera finds yet another reason for stop recording or not recording at all. With 3 different SD cards, it would stop recording within minutes, with the last purchase of Amazon SD products, it now usually lasts 15+ minutes on a good day.Even inside a car where the vibration level is low and no wind forces torment the camera, it very, very often quits with a beeping code and then refuses to resume recording.Now that I finally found a brand of SD cards it actually accepts it goes through different burn rates with the battery. How can a camera this size drain a full charge in 20 something minutes? It doesn't always do it but now and then and it is impossible to predict. I bough it for recording experiments and for documentation but it simply cannot be trusted. At least not my model.My 2nd complaint would be that it is an absolute memory hog. For the tiny, grainy sensor, one could hope for a more aggressive compression but it loves to pose as a FullHD and chew through the storage at an impressive pace.The excellent reviews I find here suggest that not all models have the same quirks. It could well be that most samples are nowhere near as finicky with SD cards as my specimen is.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: noelle
Reviews.Content: I'm so disappointed in the GoPro camera. I have the HD version and at first I was really excited to mount it on my surfboard and take it out in the water. I am not one to criticize products unless I really have a problem with them. This one tops the list. Here are my complaints:Water drops get stuck on the lens when you surf. I tried rain-x per their recommendation and it didnt work. Nothing like catching the wave of your life and having half of your head and the wave fogged out. I emailed them for advice and they basically said sorry, we cant help. You can wipe off the drops, but when you take the next wave and water hits it, there the drops are...once again.The camera seems like a great deal because of the price, but you end up having to invest in all of the extra pieces to make it an enjoyable camera. i.e. the extra view screen backing, then the antifog, then the attachment pieces. The list seems to continue.The fish eye lens doesn't video or take pics clearly for long distance and there is no zoom. Also, the fish eye lens makes the waves you ride look super small. You have to be on a long board to make them look good. If you want to video tape friends, its a real PITA.In addition, the uploading, firmware, and finding a compatible SD card is a bigger Pain In The @$$.Went from super stoked to super bummed. Hopefully someone will engineer something a little better soon. Fingers crossed!

Reviews.Title: Field of View Too Narrow For Surfing Videos
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: First off lets look at the GoPro's strong points:1. The videos of my surfing sessions look great from the standpoint of color, vividness, sharpness and generally mirror what I'm seeing while out on my board surfing.2. The GoPro actually is watertight in all surfing conditions (freefalls to the bottom of a wave, getting pounded in the impact zone, being pushed really deep in bad wipeouts etc) and the mount will stay on even in these rough conditions.3. It's light. I ride kneeboards (5' 7") that don't have much flotation and mounting the GoPro on the front of my boards doesn't change the riding characteristics of my boards. Very important to me.4. Seems to be designed and well made by techinical types.Now the weak areas from my point of view:1. For surfing, the field of view even at 170 degrees is too narrow. I usually can't actually see the wave i'm riding when playing back the video. What I do see in the video when I take off on a wave is the water rapidly rushing by the front of my board, the pier i'm surfing towards, and the beach in the distance. The wave itself is outside the field of view of the camera and can't be seen. This makes the camera and the surfboard mount useless for me. Too bad because it does take nice vivid pictures in strong sunlight.2. The lens has a lot of distortion. Normally the distortion isn't too noticeable, until I paddle out under Huntington Pier in between the pilings. The pilings are severely bowed and distorted rather than straight. This isn't too bad a problem because I can straighten them out with software processing, but it is a sign that the lens lacks quality.3. The user interface must have been designed and written by technical types for other technical types. The interface is so geeky compared to my other digital cameras that it's almost funny (in a grim sort of way). I eventually figured out what it was all about, but it took awhile. Once I figured it out I understood it, but if I don't use the camera for several months, I have to go back and learn how it works all over again.Summary:I bought the GoPro camera to take surfing videos, but since I can't see the wave itself because the field of view is too narrow and the mount doesn't swivel left or right so I could face it towards the wave ahead of me, it's usless. Too bad. It's a good idea from people who don't actually use the camera and board mount for surfing and it shows.My son is an avid bicycle rider in red rock country and I'm going to give the GoPro to him to record his rides out in the desert. Hopefully, his results will be better than my trying to use the GoPro for surfing with the surfboard mount.
