Reviews.Title: Don't know what to think
Reviews.Author: M. Floyd "traveler_mdf"
Reviews.Content: It appears I'm the only person who isn't impressed by this camera.  I just bought the 'naked' version but the contents were for the 'surf' version. It included the wrong base so I will need to return it tomorrow. After going through the primitive menu system I finally got it set to my specs.  However, there's not a way to remember all the weirdly labeled settings so I'll need to carry the instruction sheet for awhile, if I choose to keep it.  That said, the instructions aren't very good and don't include all the settings available. I left the undescribed ones on default, not knowing what they were.I've taken a number of photos with it (150 or so) and unless I'm on the highest HD setting, the images are very grainy.  It's next to impossible to take a still photo so it's obvious the camera is intended for video. I normally shoot underwater stills with my much larger Olympus PEN2; I'm not a videographer. However, I wanted a smaller camera as I'll only be doing a couple of dives this trip. Since I won't be able to review shots underwater I could be stuck with dozens of images with lots of motion.  I can't get a motion-free shot out of water so can't imagine getting a decent shot underwater.Other than Amazon ALL the reviews I found were obviously bought and paid for or written by videographers. I couldn't find anything written by a still photographer.  I'll take it on my upcoming trip but given what I've seen thus far, don't have high expectations. Maybe I'll switch to video, just to have something.

Reviews.Title: Useless at night
Reviews.Author: Michael Zatko
Reviews.Content: Works rather well during the day, but is incredibly underexposed at night making it useless unless you want to shoot a horror movie. Changing the mode setting does nothing to remedy this problem.

Reviews.Title: Great while it worked
Reviews.Author: wizze
Reviews.Content: I had the Hero HD for a few weeks.  The videos are impressive in HD.  All was fine until it would no longer turn on.  After a little research, this seems to be a very common problem.  I wish I had known this before I spent hundreds of $$ on a wonky product.  I am currently awaiting a response from Go Pro.  What really sucks is that I was counting on this camera to record a weekend trip in a few days.If you plan on uploading your videos, check your upload speed.  You might think you have a fast connection until it takes you 10 hrs to upload a 5 min video.  Not Go Pro's fault but one more thing that can be frustrating.  Editing can also be trying but the net is full of helpful tips.  This camera is a great idea but for the money I expected more.  I will update this post as more info becomes available.

Reviews.Title: Very old version of the GoPro.
Reviews.Author: rs5558
Reviews.Content: I should have paid more attention but this was a new product but three versions back.  The price was just as much as the latest models so I'm disappointed.  Buyer beware!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: GregMCooper79
Reviews.Content: I use my GoPro on everything.  From snowboarding, to dirt bike riding, to off roading in the Jeep!  Can't go wrong with it!

Reviews.Title: My kid loves it.
Reviews.Author: Richard Atwood
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son.  He loves it (when he remembers to charge it).  He wore it in a few Ragner Races.

Reviews.Title: Awesome item for what I'll use it for I can't wait to mount it in my jeep and start taking pictures and videos
Reviews.Author: William W. Dollman
Reviews.Content: It's a very good camera for what I do and it'll be perfect I can't wait to see how clear the pictures and videos will be

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: NINJA250GUY
Reviews.Content: I bought this same GoPro at Wal-Mart for my motorcycle. I just got into motorcycle about a year ago so I was kind of new to the whole motovlogging thing, But I thought I would give it a try. I bought this in July of 2013 & three months later the Hero 3+ came outI am overall satisfied with the product especially for the price I only paid $100.00 for it so I decided to keep it. For it to be three years old it is still a great camera.

Reviews.Title: The Camera that started it all
Reviews.Author: Ross J. Mehan
Reviews.Content: Great camera for it's time, incredible image quality for the price.  However compared to the newer models, a very difficult menu system.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam
Reviews.Author: Trey
Reviews.Content: I have used this to film rally racing on the roof of my WRX as well as twists and turns on my cbr600rr. With the mounting options this kit provides, it is essential to any motorsports application. No issues with the GoPro, it takes a bit to learn how to use it, as most of the functionality is provided by 2 buttons. But still worth it, takes great video, even in the rain and at night.

Reviews.Title: Up even later!
Reviews.Author: J. Lane
Reviews.Content: Now on the already late nights my husband races we must stay up later to watch gopro footage! Great Father's Day present! Love the look of the camera and the video it shoots is even better!

Reviews.Title: dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Christi Stockton
Reviews.Content: Product was listed as new yet obviously had been opened, the box was beat up and the one helmet mount that came with it was not even sticky enough to pick up bread crumbs. The helmet mount looked as though someone (or many people) had put their fingers on it. The helmet mount is useless! Felt like I paid way too much for a garage sale item.

Reviews.Title: racing
Reviews.Author: ernest langley
Reviews.Content: i us eit in my dirtcar, and it is everything i wanted. the only downfall is turning it on with limited mobility in the drivers seat, but the fixed it with the remotes

Reviews.Title: Great video - terrible audio
Reviews.Author: Conor
Reviews.Content: I've had my camera for 10 months now.  I haven't tested the surfing attachment yet so I won't comment on that specifically.Pros:* Fantastic video quality (possibly best in this category)* Strong mounts limit camera shake etc.Cons:* Terrible rattle recorded in audio - this is a known issue with these cameras and is usually caused by the buttons being loose.  There's no way to fix it as far as I have found and getting a replacement camera, you're very likely to have the same issue in the replacement as it's a manufacturing flaw.* Clunky cuboid shape - bullet designs are neater, easier to mount and more aerodynamic.* Painful settings menu* Expensive accessories are required if you want versatility to use on different sports.  I bought the front helmet mount which was not much good.  They used to do a side helmet mount which looked a lot better.  I then bought the chest mount which is excellent but expensive for a simple harness.* This particular package came with only one adhesive for mounting, and one type of hinge joint. Friends that bought previously got many adhesives and a selection of different hinge joints.

Reviews.Title: Dawn
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I never heard of this before until my son asked for one for his birthday. He is active in sports and paintballin! I've seen it work! The picture a phenomenal!!! This is a secret that should get out!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: kqh
Reviews.Content: This is my first owned GoPro camera. I was very excited when I got this. I received this item in just a short time!

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: runswithscissors
Reviews.Content: Camera seems great, however....HOW THE HECK DO YOU GET IT OFF THE BASE THAT IT CAME PACKAGED ON???...ahem, sorry. I must be an idiot, the only instructions that come with it are about the camera settings, NOTHING about how to use the various attachments. I can't even get it off of the little stand it came on....Any help?

Reviews.Title: GoPro HD Hero Camera
Reviews.Author: meltech
Reviews.Content: The camera I ordered came in on time and was what I expected.  This was a purchase for someone else and they are happy with the performance.

Reviews.Title: Works Great on my Chris Craft
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model from HumbleOutdoors (~$235)It is mounted on the bow of my boat, and has served me well.The GoPro camera is  very very nice camera the price and gives me the ability of shooting some interesting sights and sounds. The price allows me not to over fuss with the camera exposed to sometimes harsh conditions. I plan to buy the upgraded version for my ocean catamaran .

Reviews.Title: Underwhelming
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This does not seem worth the price.  My cell phone beat it many times over for quality of both photos and videos.  Maybe I got a defective one, but the video and photos it took seemed overly blurry with lots of artifacts.  The picture quality was on par with a ten year old digital camera I have.Props though for the case.  That thing seems near indestructible.

Reviews.Title: Don't break or scratch the lens!
Reviews.Author: Mark Philipp C. Espina
Reviews.Content: This camera is intended for sports and highly perilous activities.And it is for this reason that it is unfortunate that you are not able to replace the lens on the body (not the casing lens), if you accidentally scratch it, drop it, break it whilst its outside of the casing.And you have to take it out of the casing whenever you:1) Charge batteries2) Insert or take out the SD card3) Clear the case from fog4) Transfer files from the GoPro unit to the computerI've read many complaints on different forums of people having bought their new gopro units accidentally dropping them lens first onto the ground when they had to change SD cards, and ending up with a $200-$300 paper weight in their hands.GoPro will not sell you a new lens separately but will offer you a 20% off discount to buy a new unit as soon as you return your old or recently purchased one - which is admirable but this deal is more favorable to their company than it is for the customers.You're basically paying the price of a new camera to have your lens replaced.Apart from that it's a nice little cam. Just don't break or scratch your lens!

Reviews.Title: Decent camera but has issues and mine broke after 4 uses
Reviews.Author: Eric M Rose
Reviews.Content: Camera was kind of a pain to set up. Instructions are very poor. The record quality at night is horrible. During the day it looks really good.My big problem occured this weekend. The mount for my camera broke this weekend on our race car. My camera is now gone forever. Only used it 4 times. After seeing that the mount broke I checked my rear camera and mount. The camera was still there but the mount was broken as well. Almost lost that one. I notified other people in pit around me of the problem and one other guy lost his camera too the exact same way. Another found his mount is cracked too.Horrible job for GoPro here. Wasted money!

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Corey Stauffer
Reviews.Content: If you have been trying to decide if you want one of these cameras, DO IT!  The camera is amazingly easy to use, records amazing videos, and is extremely affordable.  I've been using this camera to record my mountain biking trips so far and its already taken a beating, and the footage looks incredible.The new GoPro's come with a lithium battery which after recording a 50 minute video at 960p (not the highest 1080p), the battery was still nearly full.If you want to check out what the recordings look like/how it handles, search for cstauffe29 on youtube.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for what it does!
Reviews.Author: viper1986
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Great videos- Great format options- Decent battery life for size/weight- Can be used without looking once you know the menus and beep alartsCons:- My friend's and alot of other people have the "HOT" issue, where after you first use it for an hour, it breaks and won't ever record again. We are having issues with gopro's support on this one... it should be a free replacement but being given the go around- The waterproof seal box doesn't work once you get the unit in sand! Took it out on some sand dunes and sand gets into the little buttons and i can't clean it out, i don't want to take the case apart.- Battery life is just a bit over 2 hours, not really BAD, but I wish it was a bit more. They could have used a better battery of the same size. I know they make them.- The menus are not user friendly for MOST people, any tech person or someone with a brain can get it, but its kinda dumb on the little screen. You can buy the LCD for the english and not coded version of the option menu, but it also drains the batteries ALOT faster with the LCD on.All in all, an awesome cam! Get some GRAET still pictures, HD videos, and timelapse!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price.
Reviews.Author: Jason Mcwilliams
Reviews.Content: Only shortcoming is there's no easy (included) way to review your footage while you're in the field. Also, editing the footage can be a pain on a PC.

Reviews.Title: Most awesome camera I ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Dennis Shindle
Reviews.Content: I purchase the GoPro for a skiing trip. What an awesome camera. I am so pleased to have purchased this or the family.

Reviews.Title: GoPro Hero HD
Reviews.Author: Hoofstep "Retired Thoroughbred Jock"
Reviews.Content: It works fine for me although I wish I could afford a really top-of-the-line camera. I actually got a deal on it because of my amazon points and so on..but I would recommend it to someone like myself.I am using it for videos of galloping my racehorses. Unfortunately since the track where I work has told me I AM UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES ALLOWED TO TAKE ANY PICTURES OR VIDEOS ON THE GROUNDS, PERIOD, END OF CONVERSATION (never mind that everyone who owns a cellphone is constantly rendering visual records of activities there as everywhere all over the cybersphere) I am not able to use it quite as I had originally intended.I'm still using it. Just not at mountaineer park. I have the surfing version, and I don't know if or how it differes from the motorsport and helmet versions, and would like to see this information on the website but alas I have never found any. I have created several of my own harness/ hookups depending on where I want it mounted, so when you get one (and I hope you do) don't e afraid to get creative. You can buy mounts and harnesses, but there's nothing like making one that does exactly what you want it to do.

Reviews.Title: YOU know how the present this as the perfect camera that can do just about anything
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: They are not lying to you. ITS AWESOME! Worth every penny. The battery last for ever...but I would recommend buying another just in case. And as far as SD cards.. The Kingston level 4 card work perfect....just plug it in and it works...doesn't work well in really low light for obvious reasons ..but in normal light..wow, this camera is crisp, little vibration hitting roots with a mountain bike, amazing on a motor bike and...if you do pranks on people, this camera is awesome, it has stealth mode, no sound or blinking red light, its so small and picks up sound, last forever and you can edit the video right on you software that comes with most computers now... this camera can be used for time laps, just a normal camera, all kinds of video...i dont know....just...every once in a while...someone makes a product that is GREAT and this product rocks in every way, its water proof soooooo deep as well.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Rasheed S. Alromaithi "Rashid"
Reviews.Content: I love it, it is perfect and the image quality is 10/10, but the audio is 8/10.I recommend it buy this camera and don't west you money in something else.

Reviews.Title: Small & Good Vid Quality
Reviews.Author: RhinoJosh
Reviews.Content: This Camera does a very good job for it's size and price.  You can spend a lot more on a HD camera, but none will give you the bang for the buck.  The Roll cage mount sold by Hero sucks.  If you are looking for a great mount for your HD Hero see [...].  The mount sold by Hero is the old down-side to this product as it is plastic and gives horribe vibration when recording video.

Reviews.Title: VERY difficult to use
Reviews.Author: FCP4
Reviews.Content: Mine arrived broken out of the box.  I was unable to change any of the settings.  Take a look at some of the videos online on how to set this thing up out of the box.  Very complex and there is basically no user interface, just a series of settings that supposedly toggle by hitting buttons, but didn't work for me.  Had to send back.

Reviews.Title: Go-pro
Reviews.Author: Porsche76
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my son and he loves it.  He strapped it onto his helmet and used it immediately.

Reviews.Title: Defective Super Sad :( Ruined my Offroad trip
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Just got the camera few days ago, charged the battery that came with the camera and the extra battery i purchased, after its done charging and the red light switched off, I turned on the camera it beeped 3 times then it froze with all the symbols on the screen.So what i did is what any other person would do, remove the battery and reinsert it again and BOOM the camera doesn't turn on :( Super pissed due i got a offroad trip and now i can't shoot any video :(.I called Amazon to hope solve this issue and i gotta say Amazon got the best customer service ever A+ they truly take care of there customers, they sent me one right away with fast 1 day shipping and a return label for me to send it back :). No complaints on Amazon's part.Just pissed at GoPro because they truly are bad in quality assurance. where are the times where you just buy something that just works.Contacted GoPro and they tried to troubleshoot it and i told them that i tried 2 different batteries and the camera just doesn't work, blinking red feint light infront.So now im waiting on my new GoPro which i should be receiving soon, hopefully its not defective. ( God Bless )[...]

Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: BoostMaster
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product with the intention of shooting car videos.  Here is some info that GoPro does not tell you when you buy this camera:1. If you want to use it in the car and charge it at the same time, you need to spend an extra $40 for the Skeleton mount, nobody tells you this information, you find out about it after you spend $350.2. The mount is poorly engineer with these plastic grooves and a screw that goes between them to attach the camera to the mount. The locking nut falls off.....3. The buttons on the camera are NOT labeled. Carry the manual guide with you so you can remember what each button does as far as programming goes.4. The LCD is an optional item.  This should be standard.5. The LCD has a bug in it, when you record in Up-side-down mode, the LCD displays the recording upside down. GoPro knows about it this issue but has not fixed it yet...6. GoPro customer service is one of the worst I've ever encountered. You call and do not get some sort of a ticket # or incident #. My Skeleton mount came in and was missing a part, GoPro shipped me a part, but it was incorrect.* The video quality was good at 720p, but the audio was poor.To sum up, great idea that's poorly executed and poor Customer Service.

Reviews.Title: No Card, Camera mounts flop off and camera destroyed
Reviews.Author: G. King "Aviatrix"
Reviews.Content: This was a spectacular failure as a Christmas present.  First, no where at all in the item description does it say you need a special kind of SD card, or that it is not included.  This means you give a completely non-functional gift to someone on Christmas. The item says "Complete" but this is just a *complete* lie since there is no a memory card included.  Next, go try to find one of these special SD cards anywhere unless you happen to live in a big city.  I had to go to 8 different stores the day after Christmas to find one, and it was ridiculously expensive vs what I could have paid for the same card online if it had been stated that there was not any card included in the unit and that it was useless without one.After a day of driving and chasing around to find the card, I finally had a functional gift.  The first thing he tries to do is use the helmet mount to film a short bike ride down the street.  The mount failed spectacularly by snapping off of the helmet when the elastic failed at the seam on the first real bump, and the camera was completely trashed (run over by the bike) within 10 minutes.This has got to be one of the worst gifts I have ever purchased.  The information is incomplete and misleading, the mounts are absolute CRAP, the item is far too expensive for what you get, and the recipient is now left without a gift and is very disappointed.  This is now just a pile of junk in the trash.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it.
Reviews.Author: Chrigel
Reviews.Content: Hero GoPro MotorsportDon't buy it! The case is really weak and scratches easily if you use it on your car or motorcycle. Customer service is horrible. Very stuck up and don't offer any help. Also during normal transfer to your computer I have lost several films because it just crashed. Stay away. You get what you pay for it. There are better alternatives out there.

Reviews.Title: GoPro
Reviews.Author: BC
Reviews.Content: Exchanged unit for new GoPro HD2, have not received new unit as of yet, hoping it will arrive soon! I will send new rating after the new unit arrives.

Reviews.Title: GoPro or No GoPRo
Reviews.Author: TechConsumer
Reviews.Content: Ok first impressions are hard to do over.  Camera seemed like a kid's digital camera. It looks better in the case than out.  Interface not much better than the original digital watches (poor).  Camera needs A LOT of light to produce decent video, probably ok for surf or snow.  It is very picky about which SD cards work.  I have a cheap 4 GB class 4 SDHC Transcend that worked, I have a PNY 8 GB class 10 SDHC that it doesn't even recognize. All other computers and devices recognized the PNY SD OK, couldn't format it in camera because GoPro didn't recognize it.  Didn't care much for the 10.5 x 22 inch 2 sided instructions, you need map folding skills and easy to lose your place locating the shorthand symbols used on the camera display.  If I were able to try before buying, this wouldn't be purchased. Package was a bit frustrating too. I was able to capture video, but for the money (even the sale price) it wasn't worth it.

Reviews.Title: GoPro
Reviews.Author: Mr. M. F. Wilson "www.mattwilson.cl"
Reviews.Content: Kind of sucked that one week after I bought this, a new HD2 came out for exactly the same price. Wanted it for time lapse, but the battery only lasts about 2 hours on time lapse function. Bought two new batteries incase that was the problem, and they are exactly the same! Just ordered the new HD2 so hopefully that will appease my angst

Reviews.Title: good, but not that good in low light
Reviews.Author: Frederico F. Muller "fred m."
Reviews.Content: i know this is not made for low light situations, but i did not know this was that bad.maybe it is my settings, i am not familiar yet with all the functions.in the next few days i will try some more and see if there are any improvements.cheers

Reviews.Title: good price & service
Reviews.Author: JMM "Retired"
Reviews.Content: This came as described.  It was a gift, requested by someone who was familiar w/ product.  Good service.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Total waste of money. I just spent the past hour trying to get the damn thing to work. There are two buttons. You push it once and it does one thing, push it twice and it does another. Push it three times and who the hell knows what is going to happen.So imagine your self out on your road bike with this piece of garbage on your helmet. You encounter a beautiful scene and you want to take a video. So you push one of the two buttons. Ooops .. did I push it once or twice by accident. Am I taking a video or a picture? Well if you stop and take the thing off your helmet you might be able to figure it out.Now you took some video. Did you get the scence you wanted? how did it turn? Well that is easy to find out, just hook it up to a laptop you can check out your picture.... wait.... I am on a bike in the middle of nowhere. I have to hook it up to a laptop or a monitor?? OK, that is convenient.Save yourself some money, buy a flip video camera and a couple of strong rubber bands.I am really angry about this. I was really looking forward to talking this on vacation. What a HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!!!!

Reviews.Title: unhappy customer
Reviews.Author: CUSTOMER
Reviews.Content: How do I cancel ,Cambell Camera never responded to my emails I haven't gotten product or any idea if they even have this in stock.  They are crap for servicing their customers. I well never again order from this siteGoPro HD Helmet HERO Camera

Reviews.Title: Accommodating Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Luke Klondike "whiskeyjack"
Reviews.Content: Like a lot of folks here, I bought this unit expecting to use it to capture outdoor adventures.  It did that. . . .for most of two minutes on a fresh set of AAA rechargeable NiMH batteries.  After that, neither new batteries nor the norse gods smiled on me as I tried in vain to get the camera to function for any length of time.  I got weary of trouble shooting it: trying all the fixes recommended online, on forums, in emails, in my dreams etc.  That was most of two years ago.  (rant: There's something about trouble shooting new stuff that really hacks me off.  I mean, it's NEW.  It either works as it should or it doesn't out of the box.  I'm not on their payroll: no one pays me to trouble shoot their products to get them to work. End of rant - thank you.)That said, it can accurately be said as well that my disappointment with this camera is laregely my fault for not returning it to the seller (couldn't: ebay) or returning it to GoPro in a timely manner and let THEM trouble shoot it.SO, this review has it's inconsistencies; not the least of which is my impatience with trouble shooting new stuff and intolerance for when it doesn't work after applying known possibilities.  Eventually, all's I could see was a unit that didn't work and the costs associated with shipping and repairing it.  So, I gave up and the camera & accessories got put in a box.________________I was cleaning out my office the other day and re-discovered the camera.  So, I contacted GoPro and explained the situation to see if they could use an out-of-warranty camera that didn't work (parts, refurb, etc.).  They offered me 20% off a new camera.  That was kind of them at this late date and speaks well of their customer service.  But, I doubt I'll own another GoPro product.________________At this point, the camera and all the accessories are junk that GoPro doesn't want and no one else could use.  (I wouldn't feel right selling it to anyone).________________Besides whatever criticism I might deserve, I'm left with a bad impression of GoPro cameras and can only offer this advice to potential buyers: if you have no patience with trouble shooting new stuff, do NOT buy this camera.There's a lot of positive reviews here so it's unlikely that GoPro customer service folks will chime in on my review to explain that their more recent models are new and improved and require no trouble shooting out of the box to work as advertised.  I hope that's the case and buyers of newer GoPro cameras don't have to trouble shoot the product.I gave it two stars which I think allows for my failures & impatience along the way and GoPro's 20% offer.  I still don't trust the product line though.

Reviews.Title: Battery life is limited - Serious issue
Reviews.Author: M. Brown "MB"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera... except for the battery life. Amazon actually recommended the 32g memory card, which I purchased. This would hold up to 8 hours of footage. The problem is that the camera could never keep up with that much since the battery only lasts for about 3 hours. Terrible issue when this is used for skiing and recharging is not an option on a mountain. I would not recommend this to friends or family until this issue is resolved.

Reviews.Title: HD helmet Cam
Reviews.Author: Carlos G. Mendez Gomez "camego"
Reviews.Content: They don't mention that you have to by s SD Memory card (not included in the cam). So another $72, and a extra battery $25.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful for viewing my tracking dog
Reviews.Author: Cynthia M. Pischke
Reviews.Content: I track with my dog and so she is 20 feet out from me.  This camera is awesome for this sport, where I can go home and view her work on my computer.

Reviews.Title: Good Pictures.. Underwhelming Product.
Reviews.Author: R. D. Adams
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt the camera takes great pictures; however, beyond that the overall quality is less than expected.First, its an HD camera that by the product description and manual should work with 2 through 32 Gig SD cards.. the only card it works with is a 2GB SD - and I'm using top of the line SD cards from Kingston, PNY and Sandisk.  The instructions say there is an flash update for filming upside down - there isn't.  The additional roll bar mount kit slips and doesn't hold the camera still and the bag says the manual is on the web site.. but there's no manual there so I have no idea if I'm using it correctly or not.. but so far all configurations allow the camera mount to move and cannot be locked into place.  Lastly outside of the packaging there is nothing that tells you that you've got a surf HD that's rated down to 180 feet.  The case looks exactly like every other waterproof model and the camera has no indication that it is an surf HD capable model.2GB SD card + 1080P 16:9 resolution = 26 minutes of video on a single HD card and you have to stop and dump the video or change the card.

Reviews.Title: received camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera on May 27. Amazon order states a "Delivery Estimate: June 23, 2011 - July 2, 2011". So here it is June 30 and Amazon has yet to ship the camera. Not a chance it will be here by July 2nd. Should have just gone and bought it locally. Until I get the camera I have to give 1 star. I'm sure its a good camera but I won't know till they ship it and I can try it.Update:I did finally receive the camera sometime during the summer. I actually went and bought the camera from a local rei and a month or so later Amazon finally shipped. So I have 2 of them. I then picked up a stereo housing and that's where the two cameras live.Interface... TerribleImages... Low color saturationSound... Can't expect much from a water proof housing.Should you buy it? NO Buy the Gopro Hero HD 2!Better imageBetter low light and color balanceBetter sound (with an open housing)Better interfacePS Dont buy it from amazon unless you want to wait a real long time. Buy it local if you can or from eye of mine.Update: 2/17/2013Why are you looking at this old camera. Get the HD3 Black. Or just wait 6 months and they'll have a new model. Seriously!

Reviews.Title: Don't be fooled by the specs...
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: I bought the SD camera close to a year a go to use in my car and on my sons helmet but I have had very little use of it yet. The specs on the cmera statethat you should get aout 3 hours of recording time on a set of lithium batteries but the truth is that you will get at most about 30 minutes of recording time. That's 7 - 9 dollars every 30 minutes to use this camera.I did give support every opertunity to correct the problem. I sent my camera back twice (whch they said they replaced with a new one yet they had the same markings on them that I put on them) and finaly made them send me another one before I sent the last one back. The result... I now have two cameras that go through a set of batteries every 30 minutes. Their response... "...have you tried lithium bateries?".Bottom line... if you dont mind canging bateries every 30 minutes go for it. Otherwise, dont waste your money.

Reviews.Title: what to expect from shipping
Reviews.Author: should of paid for the real deal
Reviews.Content: So as I've been researching this product on youtube and other media outlets and I've already confirmed that this camera is awesome at capturing images/video. I'm in college right now and i needed a cheap true HD cam to video tape parties n such being that the audio is crap i planned on just editing with music but to my surprise when i open the box all i found was the cam/case n the mounds with no bults to hold them together or any of the cords to even charge or hook up to my tv. I'm not pissed just a little wtfish about having fun with something i paid $190 for. Its cool tho I'll just give this guy a complaint to amazon n make sure i buy my products from companies not individuals.

Reviews.Title: Bitter Sweet
Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: ***My instresting experience***I bought the GoPro HD HERO NAKED and was very exited. I wanted a GoPro but could not aford a Hd Hero 2 or even a Helmet Hero from a origional camera. Reviews.Title: This camera is NOT for underwater use!
Reviews.Author: Travis E. Hickey "T-Bone"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera and it came with a round lens on the front of the housing unit. The round lens, of course, causes blurriness which required me to order a flat lens for it.
